title: UniversalUserIdentifier
description: An identifier string & object for all Kelp-anything related profiles, used to aim back to a global stem account.

id.description: An identifier for the row in the database as well as the primary key for other objects to relate them to the same human behind the computer.

userName.description:
A changeable human readable identifier that is exclusive (while they have it) to a user, that can be used to search for them on diffrent Kelp sites, friend them, etc.

This defaults to their identifier on Minecraft, Discord ("maccaroon2910" from "Maccaroon#2910", Spotify, email beginning ("johndoe" from "johndoe@gmail.com"), depending on what they use to sign up initally for the Kelpauth global platform.
